title: Local pairing: Syncing the same devices a second time results in crash

labels.name: priority 2: medium
labels.description: an issue that is not severely affecting the overall app, it may interfere with some users users expe

body:
# Bug Report

Syncing the same devices a second time results in crash

## Description

Perform a sync from Desktop to Desktop
Using the same instances perform the sync again with a new sync code/QR
The primary instance crashes after the sync starts

```
INF 2023-03-30 18:21:52.969+01:00 shutting down...                           topics="status-app" tid=893820 file=nim_status_client.nim:161
```
